(As a preface, I'm unsure of whether this should be in the Xbox or questions section, so moderators, please adjust my post location if necessary)

This is just a simple question. I wish to know how to raise and lower my landing gear on the latest Xbox version of KSP. Any control scheme will work. Thanks in advance.

For the cursor and radial presets, you can either go into cursor mode and click the middle button to the right of the alitmeter (with three little dots representing the feet of 3 landing legs), or you can click the right arrow on the dpad to open the "default action groups" radial menu and then use the left stick to select the landing gear action group. There should be tooltips that show up to tell you that it's the landing gear action that you are selecting. Additionally, if I recall correctly, in radial preset you can use Left Bumper + X, I think?
